attributes.action: Have an annual bank holiday to celebrate our frontline services such as the NHS
attributes.additional_details: To show to our frontline services what they mean to us as a country.  I’m sure everyone feels that the frontline services deserve all the appreciation we can offer.
attributes.background: Following the current climate with the Coronavirus is shows how important our frontline services are, could parliament agree a national bank holiday for the UK to come together and celebrate our frontline services. Including the NHS, Police, Fire Services, Armed forces.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307364
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
